msg.msgText: The client request to publish a message to the server failed because the destination is full: ConnectionID={0} ClientID={1} Protocol={2} Endpoint={3}.

msgExplanation.p: A message could not be published because the topic has reached the MaxMessages limit configured for the messaging policy. This log entry is shown only once per connection.

msgUserResponse.p: If a larger number of messages needs to remain on topics for all consumers to receive the messages, increase the MaxMessages setting for the messaging policy.
